title: Rasathi Unnai Lyrics Vaithegi Kathirunthal
stanzas:
Kannukkoru vanna kili
kaathukkoru gaana kuyil
nenjokkoru vanji kodi
neethanamma(2)

yaarodu ingu enakkena pechu
nee thaane kanne
naan vangum moochu
vaazhnthaaga vendum
vaa vaa kanne

raasathi unna kaanaatha nenju
kaathadi polaaduthu
pozhthaagi pochu velakkethiyaachu
pon maane unna theduthu

Mangai oru gangai ena
mannan oru kannan ena
kaathil oru kadhal kadhai
sunnaal enna(2)

aththai magalo
maamman magalo
sondham ethuvo
bandham ethuvo
santdhithathum sindhithathum
thithithida

ammaadi nee thaan
illaatha naanum
venmegam vandhu
neendhadha vaanam
thaangaatha yaekkam
pothum pothum
